nodes.text: Ayor-v9 was a male Gran member of the White Maw pirate gang during the Galactic War. He was a captain of Reneget Vause and preferred to spend time with his many droids, considering them "his family." In 3642 BBY he was confronted and killed by a bounty hunter, who sought to draw Vause out of hiding.
Ayor-v9 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on Hoth.
